00028 #ifndef _PASSENGER_NGINX_CONTENT_HANDLER_H_
00029 #define _PASSENGER_NGINX_CONTENT_HANDLER_H_

00031 #include <ngx_core.h>
00032 #include <ngx_http.h>
00033 
00034 
00035 typedef enum {
00036     AP_RAILS,
00037     AP_RACK,
00038     AP_WSGI,
00039     AP_NONE
00040 } passenger_app_type_t;
00041 
00042 typedef struct {
00043     /** Proxy state. */
00044     ngx_uint_t  status;
00045     ngx_uint_t  status_count;
00046     u_char     *status_start;
00047     u_char     *status_end;
00048     
00049     /** The backend application's 'public' directory. */
00050     ngx_str_t   public_dir;
00051     
00052     /** The application's base URI. Points to an empty string if none. */
00053     ngx_str_t   base_uri;
00054     
00055     /** The backend application's type. */
00056     passenger_app_type_t app_type;
00057 } passenger_context_t;
